lead_paragraph: When rugby sevens was added to the rollcall of sports for the 2016 Summer Olympics, New Zealanders rubbed their hands in gleeful anticipation.

headline.print_headline: New Zealand Hopes for Success as Rugby Returns in Rio
headline.main: New Zealand Hopes for Success as Rugby Returns in Rio
